tool_description: Configures and enables specific MFA methods for a user account with security settings and backup options.

mfa_method.description: MFA method type (totp, sms, email, biometric, hardware_token)

method_config.description: JSON configuration specific to the MFA method

is_primary.description: Whether this is the primary MFA method

backup_enabled.description: Whether backup codes should be generated

require_admin_approval.description: Whether admin approval is required for this method

expiry_days.description: Number of days before method expires (1-365)

error_messages: Invalid MFA method: Method must be one of [totp, sms, email, biometric, hardware_token].
Configuration error: Method configuration is invalid or incomplete for the specified MFA method.
User not found: The specified user_id does not exist in the system.
Method already configured: This MFA method is already configured for the user. Use update operation instead.
Invalid expiry period: expiry_days must be between 1 and 365.
usage: Provide user_id, mfa_method, and method_config to set up MFA. Configure primary method, backup options, and admin approval requirements as needed.

configuration_id.description: Unique identifier for the MFA configuration

expiry_date.description: Expiration date for the MFA method
